text: Jhulia Rayssa Mendes Leal, also known as Rayssa Leal, (born 4 January 2008) is a goofy-footed Brazilian skateboarder from Imperatriz, Brazil. Rayssa won silver at the Tokyo Olympic Games and bronze at Paris 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== *We Checked In On 10-Year-Old Skater Rayssa Leal and She Still Rips | The Inertia Category:Living people Category:Skateboarders Category:Olympic silver medalists for Brazil Category:2008 births Category:Medalists at the 2020 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2024 Summer Olympics Category:People from Maranh√£o
title: Rayssa Leal
